titles.title: Preventing Unwarranted Communications Shutdowns Act of 2020
Preventing Unwarranted Communications Shutdowns Act of 2020
To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to provide for requirements for the exercise of the emergency powers of the President under section 706 of such Act, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Preventing Unwarranted Communications Shutdowns Act of 2020
This bill limits the authority of the President to exercise certain emergency powers related to communications (e.g., suspending or amending rules and regulations applicable to facilities or stations for wire communications).
